metadata.dc:author: García González, R
Allona Almagro, A
Cuesta Roca, C
Cruz Guerra, N A
Escudero Barrilero, A
Sanz Migueláñez, J L
metadata.dc:description: We present an unusual case of single kidney metastasis from an primary esophageal neoplasm. Its main clinical and diagnostic topics are described. They made us consider him as a good candidate for surgery. The pathological study of the nephrectomy specimen was surprising. The postoperative period was unfortunate, however.
metadata.dc:title: Metástasis renal solitaria de un cáncer primario esofágico.
[Solitary renal metastasis of primary esophageal cancer].
